name: SOCIAL_CARE_EPS_UPDTE_HX
description: Update history for Social Care specific episode data.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SC_UPDATE_INSTANT_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the episode was updated.

columns.name: SC_UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who updated the episode

columns.name: SC_UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: SC_UPDATE_RESP_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the responsible user when this line was updated.

columns.name: SC_UPDATE_RESP_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
